trans-unit.target: TEXT_CMNDEFSCRIPCONVERT_00390_TALK_GREETING_00000<tab>Greetings, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>. If you have any <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8020302 /var> or <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8030302 /var>, I should be glad to offer you <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8040302 /var> and <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8050302 /var> respectively in exchange.
TEXT_CMNDEFSCRIPCONVERT_00390_ASK_SCRIP_Q000<tab>Select the scrip you wish to exchange.

TEXT_CMNDEFSCRIPCONVERT_00390_ASK_EXCHANGE_Q000<tab>Exchange <var 08 E4E80302 ((<var 20 E803 /var> <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8020202 /var>)) ((<var 20 E803 /var> <var 31 ((Item)) 04E802E80302 /var>)) /var> for <var 08 E4E80502 ((<var 20 E805 /var> <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8040202 /var>)) ((<var 20 E805 /var> <var 31 ((Item)) 04E804E80502 /var>)) /var>?
TEXT_CMNDEFSCRIPCONVERT_00390_ASK_LIMIT_Q000<tab>Warning: You will not be able to receive all <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8020302 /var>. Do you still wish to proceed?
TEXT_CMNDEFSCRIPCONVERT_00390_TALK_NOTOBTAINABLE_00000<tab>Oh? You don't appear to have any <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8020302 /var>...
TEXT_CMNDEFSCRIPCONVERT_00390_TALK_MAXIMUM_00000<tab>Oh? It seems you already possess the maximum number of <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8020302 /var> permitted...
